metadata.description: GitLab automation utilities for Claude Code - CI/CD operations, pipeline management, and DevOps workflows

plugins.name: gitlab-cicd-helper
plugins.description: Comprehensive GitLab CI/CD automation plugin for triggering pipelines, launching manual jobs, monitoring status, and retrieving logs

plugins.name: gitlab-mr-helper
plugins.description: GitLab Merge Request management plugin for creating, listing, and updating MRs

plugins.name: gitlab-cicd-reference
plugins.description: Expert knowledge for GitLab CI/CD YAML configuration, pipeline architecture, caching strategies, and optimization patterns. Provides a specialized subagent and comprehensive skill for advanced .gitlab-ci.yml development.
